column4: I know this isn't relevant to anyone elses problem but I thought this was an awesome alternative to scp. You can click on your desktop and hit ctrl+L and ssh://hostname@ipaddress and get a completely graphical way to send or receive files from your server

I'm not sure exactly what it's called but I read it in the forums you just hit ctrl+L at your desktop and I imagine this only works if the server is running ubuntu but I thought it was pretty sweet I'd never even heard of it before now
is anyone else getting spammed right now?
